Articles.Content:
Thinking about starting a collection? The Dock likes to put Beavers to work as often as possible. Get 'em moving!

The lads are taking the party into orbit, rockin' out with their Beaver.

Download:

Beaver v1.0

Edited April 6, 2014 by O-Doc
I have to admits that looks pretty good with those eyes, what is the max asteroid size that it can capture?

Thanks. I don't know for sure about the size but, it has 72T of fuel and 10K dV. I guessing about 3000T is pretty safe with a redirect into atmosphere and a burn back at apogee to complete the orbit. This will take up to a C class anywhere you want to put it.

I thought about making a a stupidly large ARM but, at the end of the day it's more fun to have one craft that can make a capture with all roids and then send up an ion tug to reposition larger captured roids.
